title: WB Exhibit
insight: This piece was created for the Korea exhibit. As soon as I saw the duck boats & bikers, I knew it had to be the Han River.

title: Basalt Cliffs
insight: These hexagonal columns were created naturally when the Hallasan lava flowed into the sea.

title: Coastal Fields
insight: Being by the water reminds me of my childhood (esp. Lake Superior). Sunsets on the water >>
